name: Brigadier
description: A classic combination that's good at this time of year is a mixture of good hot chocolate and green Chartreuse. While the pairing might seem awkward at first glance, there's something about the potent herbal liqueur that matches perfectly with the rich earthiness of good chocolate.

recipeInstructions.text: Add Cherry Heering and Chartreuse to hot chocolate, stir, and serve immediately. You can add up to 1 ounce each of Cherry Heering and Chartreuse to your taste.
